#summary Running in Eclipse with Maven Ant
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

This project is developed with NetBeans 6.9.1. There is no obvious reason, why it cannot be run in Eclipse with Maven Ant. Though it is not tested, but here is good source of information, how to enable Annotation processor in Eclipse with Maven Ant (see http://deors.wordpress.com/2011/10/08/annotation-processors/).
